cta_subtitle: Safely eject water from the speaker
disclaimer_body: This app plays a strong low-frequency tone to help eject water. Effectiveness is not guaranteed. Use at your own risk.
onboarding_page1_description: Safely remove water that has entered your mobile device's speakers using special sound frequencies.

onboarding_page3_description: This application is a supportive tool. Results may vary depending on the device model. Use at your own risk.
about_dialog_description: This tool measures sound pressure level using your mic.
permission_permanently_denied_message: Microphone permission is denied for dB measurement. Please grant permission from settings.
permission_request_message: Microphone access is required for dB measurement. Would you like to grant permission?
premium_description: Enjoy unlimited access and premium features
stereo_start_test: Press the button to start testing
stereo_about_description: This tool allows you to test the left and right speaker channels on your device.
tone_subtitle: Adjustable frequency for water ejection (20â€“300 Hz)
tone_about_description: This app generates tones to help eject water from your device. Use responsibly and at your own risk.
auto_loop_description: Auto Loop: Automatically switches between channels during testing
ready_hint: Tap the start icon inside the circle.
